select subjectId, subjectName, subjectText, subjectType, subjectTypeName, subjectNO, subjectOutline, subjectSchedule, subjectInfo, subjectIsvalid, subjectTeacherName, subjectTeacherId, subjectDepartment, subjectDepartmentName, subjectYear, subjectRemark, subjectCredit, classHourForTheory, classHourForTest, classHourForMachine, classHourForOther, termClassHourForOne, termClassHourForTwo, termClassHourForThree, termClassHourForFour, termClassHourForFive, termClassHourForSix, termClassHourForSeven, termClassHourForEight, subjectTeachOrResearch, subjectRank from t_subject
order by $orderByClause$
